project.name: Airbnb Planner Multi-Agent Example
project.description:
Spring AI A2A example demonstrating server-side A2A agents and client coordination:
Server-side A2A Agents (using spring-ai-a2a-server): - accommodation-agent: Hotel recommendations agent (port 10002) - weather-agent: Weather forecasting agent (port 10001)
Client (using A2A Java SDK directly): - travel-planner: REST API that coordinates with remote A2A agents (port 8080) • Uses A2A Java SDK to call remote agents programmatically • No LLM orchestration - explicit coordination logic • Demonstrates pure client-side A2A SDK usage
